Chapman Magazine

August 18, 2020 Erica De Guzman











Fall 2022
Chapman Magazine














 








Featured





Something in the Air









National recognition shines a light on Chapman Radio, where the freeform programming continues to evolve, but the strong sense of community endures.





 








Featured





Brewing Possibility



 





For food science students, learning is anything but a grind, thanks to the mentorship and camaraderie of the Chapman Coffee Club.





 








Must Read





The Banner of Leadership









Global impact rises from actions close to home as collaborative difference-makers share an unflagging commitment to innovation.











Fall 2022 Issue: Local Inspiration, Global Impact
Meet the students of the Chapman Coffee Club and other campus leaders who are cultivating immersive and impactful learning communities.
